description: System-generated unique identifier for this upgrade metadata record.
Name of the table in the application schema affected by the recorded upgrade action.
Name of the column within that table impacted by the upgrade.
Category of schema or data adjustment applied during the upgrade.
Parameter for the operation, such as the new column name, default value, or explanatory note.
Declared data type associated with the value or column, stored as an application code type (likely CLR type; confirm with SME).
Timestamp when this upgrade metadata record was last updated.
Identifier of the user or process that created this record.
Date and time when this record was created.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified this record.
Date and time of the most recent modification to this record.
